caption:
This photograph depicts an urban alleyway bathed in shadows and sunlight, creating a play of light and dark across the scene. The alley is framed by tall buildings on both sides, with one side featuring a vertical corrugated metal pattern and the other a textured concrete or stone surface. Both sides of the buildings cast dramatic shadows onto the walkway, generating a geometric pattern.

A prominent feature in this image is the metal staircase running alongside one of the buildings. It is a fire escape type, with visible stairs and landings that add a linear element to the composition. Light filters through the staircase, casting grid-like shadows that enhance the urban aesthetic of the scene.

At the end of the alley, the outdoor light brightens the area, contrasting with the predominantly shaded foreground. There are a few people visible in the distance, suggesting the alley is a passageway or connected to a busier street or area.

Overall, the photograph captures an architectural and human environment where light plays a significant role in defining the space, providing a stark yet dynamic visual texture likely in a city setting.
title: Greenhouses are part of the new addition to the Irwin Union Bank.
